Methods

Solve(double[], bool[], double[], double[], Func<double[], object[], double[]>, params object[])

Optimization method. This calls MPFit Levenberg Marquardt solver. For examples of usage, see TestMPFit.cs: https://csmpfit.codeplex.com/SourceControl/latest#src/MPFitLib.Test/TestMPFit.cs For an example of a call with the objective function: https://csmpfit.codeplex.com/SourceControl/latest#src/MPFitLib.Test/ForwardModels.cs

public double[] Solve(double[] a, bool[] ia, double[] y, double[] ey, Func<double[], object[], double[]> forwardFunc, params object[] forwardVariables)

Parameters

a double[]

optimization parameter initial guess

ia bool[]

accompanying array to a that specifies which parameters to fit (held constant otherwise)

y double[]

"measured" values

ey double[]

standard deviation values of y

forwardFunc Func<double[], object[], double[]>

delegate function that evaluates the objective function given a parameter optimization array and (optional) constant variables

forwardVariables object[]

additional variables needed to solve forward function

Returns

double[]

inverse solution array

SolveWithConstraints(double[], bool[], double[], double[], double[], double[], Func<double[], object[], double[]>, params object[])

Optimization method. This calls MPFit Levenberg Marquardt solver with constraints.

public double[] SolveWithConstraints(double[] a, bool[] ia, double[] lowerBounds, double[] upperBounds, double[] y, double[] ey, Func<double[], object[], double[]> forwardFunc, params object[] forwardVariables)

Parameters

a double[]

optimization parameter initial guess

ia bool[]

accompanying array to a that specifies which parameters to fit (held constant otherwise)

lowerBounds double[]

accompanying array that specifies lower bounds for parameters

upperBounds double[]

accompanying array that specifies upper bounds

y double[]

"measured" values

ey double[]

standard deviation values of y

forwardFunc Func<double[], object[], double[]>

delegate function that evaluates the objective function given a parameter optimization array and (optional) constant variables

forwardVariables object[]

additional variables needed to solve forward function

Returns

double[]

inverse solution array
